item.title: ‘I think we’ve been lied to’: Who exactly is considered rich in America?
item.description: A middle-class person in America would be considered rich beyond most people’s wildest dreams in many parts of the world.

item.title: This biotech’s stock soared as investors look for the next buyout target
item.description: Dyne Therapeutics’ stock sees record rally, but one analyst says it could still climb a lot further, after a rival got bought out for a big premium.

item.title: Qualcomm ups its game in AI, sending its stock to a 15-month high

item.title: ‘I’m in the home stretch’: I’m 80. Do I leave my kids a ‘Magnificent Seven’ dynasty trust or a brokerage account?
item.description: “Do I leave them to pay capital-gains tax on the dynasty trust or estate tax on my personal account?”

item.title: Why the odds of gas prices falling below $2 anytime soon are one in a million
item.description: Gasoline prices at the pump last week fell to their lowest average intraday price in four years, but aren’t likely to see a dip below $2 a gallon any ...
